description:
Saijou-sensei starts working part-time after school hours for a company called Black Fund. But just as she falls in love with her boss, the president of the company, the head of the PTA tries to set her up with an arranged marriage...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Passionate Love Warning! Senjou-sensei`s Part-time Job!
熱愛警報! 西条先生のアルバイト
